tool_description: Convert & Download single video or multiple Youtube videos in Mp3 format using our youtube to mp3 API. Multiple Embedding features are supported like html link, javascript, iframe. Its free also provide affiliate programs.
name: Youtube To Mp3 Download
title: Youtube To Mp3 Download

api_list.name: For Downloading Single Videos as MP3
api_list.description: Enter the youtube video id that you want to download as mp3.

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description: Its for single video just enter its id like lF-jPBnZ098

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coolguruji-youtube-to-mp3-download-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?id=lF-jPBnZ098"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coolguruji-youtube-to-mp3-download-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coolguruji-youtube-to-mp3-download-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?id={video_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coolguruji-youtube-to-mp3-download-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: For Downloading Multiple Videos as MP3
api_list.description: For Retrieving multiple videos in mp3 format just separate them with comma, dont put any space etc

required_parameters.name: videos-ids
required_parameters.description: For Retrieving multiple videos in mp3 format just separate them with comma, dont put any space etc
